stepAnswer: Explain how long it would take to accomplish a task, like walking a mile at sloth speed
stepTitle: If you had to communicate how slowly a sloth moves, what would be an effective comparison?
choices: Convert the speed to a fraction of the speed of a launching rocket ship.
Compare it to the speed of another animal of similar size.
Just share the speed as you have it, your audience can "do the math" and understand.
Explain how long it would take to accomplish a task, like walking a mile at sloth speed
